about_the_game:
A Roguelike card game based on Chinese character rules! Cards are designed according to the meaning of the characters. You can composite stronger character cards, and composite words to enhance their skills. Emergence of unconstrained builds, experience endless fun!


Each Chinese character is a card. The Chinese character system is a huge card pool! (Yes, the title of this description is also card!)
It is divided into human, object, plant, ghost and other categories, and its health value is equal to the number of strokes.
The cards will fight automatically against random and interesting combinations of Chinese characters!



According to the meaning of Chinese characters, every Chinese character has irreplaceable interest!
Besides, skills are also related to each other like Chinese characters. "Book" can strengthen human beings, "axe" can cut wood, and "Tao" can cultivate.



Chinese characters can synthesize new Chinese character cards according to the dictionary, inherit skills or select the exclusive skills of new Chinese characters!
All commonly used Chinese characters are supported in theory. At present, 3500 first-level Chinese characters and some other Chinese characters in the General Chinese Character Specification have been imported.



Chinese characters can form any words that conform to grammar, make cards golden and strengthen skills.
It's easy to form super interesting combinations!
All commonly used words are supported in theory. At present, 100000 common words have been imported. We are trying to support richer forms such as poetry.
detailed_description:
Follow the latest news of the game


From the Chinese Department, I had a dream in the course of philology. The Chinese characters in the dream are more interesting than this course: every Chinese character is alive, with its own gender, age, character, relationship... They live in a world called Chinese culture.
After years of research, this dream has come into reality in the form of games.
This is a very difficult design, and your feedback and suggestions are urgently needed.
